
# Noise in the marine environment

## Sources of noise [@duarte2021]

-   Shipping noise
-   Pile driving
-   Seismic airgun
-   Military sonar
-   Acoustic deterrents

## Impacts of noise

-   Behavioural change
-   Displacement – ie animals leave an area [@tyack2008]
-   Masking of communication –
-   Hearing damage - permanent & temporary threshold shift [@mickle2019]
-   Stress
-   Strandings & death
